summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll for the repair of concrete sidewalks in front of Lot 3, Block 1, Burke's 2nd Addition, and certain other property, as authorized by Ordinance No. 45712, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land, other property known as shown on said roll, establishing a L.I.D. and L.I.D. Fund, etc.
